channel.title: Pages on Bryan Holman
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Bryan Holman

item.title: About Bryan
item.description: I’m a meteorologist turned data scientist. In graduate school I studied how feature engineering and machine learning could improve wind forecastsâ€“picking up Python, R, SQL, and data science along the way. After graduate school I joined Kyruus Health, where I dove into data engineering, the cloud (GCP and AWS), dbt, and people/project leadership. Currently I’m an AI Architect at Insight, where I design and build AI/ML-powered applications. From five to nine I’m spending time with my amazing family, working out, playing sports, listening to instrumental rock, drumming, and enjoying all the Pacific Northwest has to offer.

item.title: Resources
item.description: Most of what I’ve learned during my career has been through on-the-job learning or self-study. The internet has a wealth of valuable content, one just needs to know where to find it. Here I’ve collected the resources to which I refer the most. Data analysis Packages: Pandas for data analysis plotly for data visualization Data engineering Documentation: dbt’s best practices GoogleSQL reference for BigQuery Machine learning/AI Courses: Machine Learning Engineer learning path with Google Cloud Documentation:
